casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Frank Durand TOMLIN No. 532P08-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 5, 2018 Teresa M. Postell, Assistant Attorney General, J. Douglas Henderson, District Attorney, for State of NC. Amanda S. Zimmer, Assistant Appellate Defender, Frank Durand Tomlin, for Tomlin, Frank Durand.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 15th of March 2018 in this matter for a writ of mandamus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Guilford County:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of April 2018."
